title: Battle Regalia Poppy Chromas?

embed.description: 6 New Chroma skins available for Battle Regalia Poppy. Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights Facebook for all you FB Users who want to keep upto date: https://www.facebook.com/Skinspotlights For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/

body:
I'm still waiting for the new {{champion:78}} Chromas to become available.

The 6.22 Patch Notes say that they're supposed to be released in this patch and, to be fair, the ability to select the Chromas has been added to the Battle Regalia skin in Champion Selection. However, they're still not available for purchase in the store.

It has been over a week since the patch went into effect and even longer since the Chromas were announced on YouTube.

Rito please! I _really_ want these Chromas! 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: They're still heading out this patch AFAIK - not everything is unlocked at the beginning of a new patch. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=taIBWEcK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-18T18:42:16.469+0000)
>
> They're still heading out this patch AFAIK - not everything is unlocked at the beginning of a new patch. :)

So, here is the last day of the patch. Was that really necessary? (Assuming they come out today)

*Copy pasta from above, just for visibility.*
 
Sorry for the miscommunication here. I was basing my statement off of the 6.22 patch notes, which does state they come out in 6.22. I'm not sure if the slightly different release timelines has caused a change here, but it's something I'm looking into today. We didn't forget about them by any means. Sorry for the delay here - thanks for your patience!
Thank you for the feedback and sorry I didn't bother to check back on this after awhile. :)

So today is literally the last day of the patch, so if they aren't released by today they will have to carry over into the next patch, which is kind of ridiculous. Did you guys just forget about them? Have been waiting on these Poppy chromas all patch.

Hey there - 

Sorry for the miscommunication here. I was basing my statement off of the 6.22 patch notes, which does state they come out in 6.22. I'm not sure if the slightly different release timelines has caused a change here, but it's something I'm looking into today. We didn't forget about them by any means. Sorry for the delay here - thanks for your patience!

**Edit:**: Now available!
You do realize its holiday time right now, so somethings are not going to be kept up with perfectly (even with the next patch being pushed out a day earlier).
So were on 6.23 and they're still not availabe. Rito pls what is this shit?! {{champion:78}} {{item:2050}} {{champion:78}}

> not everything is unlocked at the beginning of a new patch. :)

hmm day 11 is not really the beginnig of a new patch. 
I hope they will come together with the new patch.
